attributes.action: Mp's Should Debate Fuel Costs NOW Not Say They're Too Busy
attributes.additional_details:
The petition for debating the cost of fuel soared past 100,000 signatures, meaning it should be debated by MP's, but they are "too busy".

It's our taxes, our money, our roads, they're our MP's and it's our country, we decide what's important to us so debate the cost of fuel NOW!
Do not sweep it under the carpet, this will not go away.
